name: DELAWARE VALLEY TRANSPLANT PROGRAM, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA REGIONAL TISSUE BANK, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Delaware Valley Transplant Program v. Pennsylvania Regional Tissue Bank
docket_number: Petition No. 655 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1997

parties: DELAWARE VALLEY TRANSPLANT PROGRAM, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA REGIONAL TISSUE BANK, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of March, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is denied as to question 1 as stated in the Petition. The Petition is granted as to questions 2 through 5 as stated in the petition, and the matter is remanded to the Commonwealth Court for disposition of those issues on the merits. Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Christopher A. Lewis, Jan L. Weinstock, Philadelphia, James B. Dilsheimer, Washington, DC, Terrence R. Nealon, Scranton, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
706 A.2d 1206
DELAWARE VALLEY TRANSPLANT PROGRAM, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA REGIONAL TISSUE BANK, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 13, 1998.
Christopher A. Lewis, Jan L. Weinstock, Philadelphia, James B. Dilsheimer, Washington, DC, Terrence R. Nealon, Scranton, for petitioner.
